title: To deal with a fed Yasuo
body: Too few people, I mean far too few, fail to note when a fed Yasuo is building all of{{item:3072}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3074}}   and Warlords blood lust :l when he is beginning to carry his team single handedly, they try too hard to burst him down without building {{item:3123}} {{item:3033}}  or {{item:3165}} or even using something basic like {{summoner:14}} to bring him down which leads to him instead. I see this on my own team, I see this on opposing teams. It's really frustrating to not only see this on my team but opposing teams as well.  Of course I will always make sure to purchase an item with grevous wounds even if I happen to be support just to make sure I can apply its god damn effects in team fights so that my team has a chance at least :l

replies.body: I think you were in my recent games where my diamond mate Yasuo was fed and I made him unkillable and unescapable as the Zilean Support. XD
I tip my hat to anyone who plays {{champion:26}} , for he is one of my personal favourites.
200,000 mastery points on him :D I love him and his utility . not many people realise how strong he is because no one really plays him right. ty for the hat tip :P
